metadata.name: ORION PURPLE GREEN #090/100
metadata.description: CULT&RAIN is the first luxury fashion house born from crypto and launches with a highly collectible Genesis Collection, comprising of 1406 4K animated NFT’s matched with 1406 physical luxury sneakers. Each NFT is tied to an identical pair of ‘Made in Italy’ luxury sneakers valued at over $1200, sourcing the finest materials and fabrication through CULT&RAIN’s coveted Italian supply chains. The Genesis collection of NFT’s comprises of 4 radical sneaker designs, 5 unique colorways each, 20 unique colorways total. Each sneaker model is an original design. This is your entry to our CULTR_PASS - a utility pass that embraces community, luxury fashion, and a brave new world of digital art and IRL benefits and value.
